DOC.brief_summary: The CL1-64315-001 study phase I , international , multicentre , open-label , non-randomised , non-comparative study . This study design two part : one part dose escalation , one part dose expansion .
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study S64315 Administred Intravenously Patients With Acute Myeloid Leukaemia Myelodysplastic Syndrome
